backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing chatroom functionality with user profiles, messages, reactions, access control, blob storage, and HTTP outcalls. Includes CRUD operations for chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and admin functions with role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components including App.tsx, hooks, Header, ChatArea, MessageBubble, MessageInput, ProfileSetupModal, and LoginP (truncated).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags and versioned script import (v=203) for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with TanStack Router setup defining routes for lobby, chatroom, and admin pages, with conditional header/footer rendering and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting user avatars via file upload, Giphy search/trending GIFs, or removal, with debounced search and request tracking.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll, reply functionality, and message filtering to hide Creator messages without media.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and category badges. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL input (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter post previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, username editing (alphanumeric validation, 15 char limit), avatar picker, and back-to-lobby button when in chatroom view.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing; authentication is explicitly not used in this anonymous application.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Giphy, images, voice), pin/unpin functionality, and reply threading. Handles emoji reactions and Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat message input component with text area (2000 char limit), image upload, Giphy search/trending GIFs, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in message text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button at the top of the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, and a progress slider for voice messages. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a value by delaying its update until a specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging legacy cache entries, detecting persisted empty arrays, and forcing a refetch. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal and resets on actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and identity persistence using @dfinity/auth-client. Provides authentication status, identity object, and login/clear functions to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations (fetching, creating, sending, reacting), with helper functions for username generation, localStorage management, and converting backend linked-list types to frontend arrays. Includes query key normalization for search and category filtering.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-optimized viewport handling, and custom styling for voice message range inputs with gradient progress indicators.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration including the API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function that formats numbers into compact notation with k/M/B suffixes (e.g., 1234 -> "1.2k").
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a single chatroom page, fetching chatroom data by ID from URL params, incrementing view count on load, and rendering the ChatArea component with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page that displays a list of chatrooms with search and category filtering, includes a create chatroom dialog, and handles client-side filtering of fetched chatroom data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata indicating this is a room booking/scheduling application with a current focus on removing all caller and principal authentication checks from the backend to make methods publicly accessible.
